body_content.explanation: a frothy coffee drink (= one that is thick and full of bubbles) made by whipping together (= mixing very quickly for a long time) coffee powder, sugar and hot water, then adding this mixture to cold or warm milk so that the milk is at the bottom and the whipped coffee on top:
examples: Dalgona coffee is the Korean coffee drink taking the internet by storm.
A dalgona coffee is like a cappucino turned on its head.
